SFM-Utils - Converts Toolbox .txt files into SFM for Paratext

Usage

Required: Paratext project name (can be 3-character abbreviation)

Then choose one of the following along with the corresponding path to txt/dir:

  • A single Toolbox text file (one chapter of a book)
  • Directory of Toolbox text files for a single book (one chapter per file)
  • JSON file representing a single book - used for testing conversion to SFM
  • Directory of directories (each subdirectory is a separate book)
Processing Mode
